text:
At the moment in all SSH elements (scp, etc.) only file is supported as source. It is good URI to be supported also because in many cases the web link will be the source. Now we must copy that web link on the local machine and then to pass as file parameter.
It is good all ant source files to support URI.
creator: miro@space-comm.com

text: It would be better to resource-enable scp and use a <url> resource in that case.
